  • Classes in gui used by gui
    Class
    Description
    MainFrame
    This is the main frame of the program.
    PetrinetGraph
    Interface for a graph representing a petrinet.
    PetrinetPanel
    A JPanel representing a Petrinet loaded from a file.
    PetrinetToolbar
    A toolbar for interactions with petrinets via a PetrinetToolbarController representing the current state of a PetrinetPanel.
    ResizableSplitPane
    This is a subclass of JSplitPane but the divider stays in place even if the parent container is resized, hence the name resizable split pane.
